references.paper_title: Practical Bayesian Optimization of Machine Learning Algorithms
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of Bayesian Optimization, introducing practical algorithms and applications that have had a significant impact on machine learning.

references.paper_title: A New Method of Locating the Maximum Point of an Arbitrary Multipeak Curve in the Presence of Noise
references.reason: This paper is among the earliest to introduce the concept of Bayesian Optimization and is considered a seminal work in the field.

references.paper_title: On Bayesian methods for seeking the extremum
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced the theory and application of Bayesian methods for optimization.

references.paper_title: Efficient global optimization of expensive black-box functions
references.reason: This paper introduced a highly efficient algorithm for global optimization that is widely used in various fields.

references.paper_title: Entropy search for information-efficient global optimization
references.reason: This paper presented a novel acquisition function for Bayesian optimization that significantly improved sample efficiency.
